title: Update chora-base documentation to reference chora-compose v1.9.0 capabilities
description:
chora-compose v1.9.0 introduces stigmergic context links and freshness tracking that enable efficient cross-repository coordination. This coordination request proposes updating chora-base documentation to leverage these new capabilities for SAP documentation maintenance and cross-repo workflows.

Key changes in v1.9.0:
- Stigmergic context links: 95% token reduction (20kâ†’1k) for cross-repo operations
- Freshness tracking: Automated staleness detection with check_freshness tool
- Collections documentation: Complete reference for 3-tier content generation

Proposed updates to chora-base:
1. Add stigmergic context links to AGENTS.md for SAP regeneration
2. Document freshness tracking workflow for SAP maintenance
3. Update cross-repo coordination examples in relevant SAPs
4. Add CI/CD integration examples for automated freshness checks
expected_outcome: chora-base documentation references chora-compose v1.9.0 capabilities, enabling efficient SAP regeneration and maintenance workflows via stigmergic context links and freshness tracking
acceptance_criteria: chora-base AGENTS.md includes stigmergic context link examples (e.g., [@chora-compose/collection:sap-004-complete])
SAP maintenance workflow documented with freshness tracking integration
At least one CI/CD example showing automated freshness checks
Cross-references between chora-base and chora-compose documentation are bidirectional
Changes validated by generating at least one SAP using stigmergic context links

context.background: chora-compose v1.9.0 was released on 2025-10-30 with major cross-repository coordination features (stigmergic context links, freshness tracking). These features were specifically designed to address token efficiency and maintenance challenges when chora-base needs to regenerate SAP documentation. The coordination request COORD-2025-002 (SAP generation via Collections) successfully demonstrated the technical feasibility. Now we need to update documentation to make these capabilities discoverable and usable.

dependencies.dependency: Documentation of stigmergic context links in chora-compose
Documentation of freshness tracking in chora-compose
